lead_paragraph: When Michael Phelps arrived in Rio as a 31-year-old swimmer who retired once and endured plenty of turmoil away from the pool, everyone wondered just how many gold medals was a realistic goal.

headline.main: For Michael Phelps, 6 Gold Medals Seem Very Much in Reach
headline.print_headline: For Michael Phelps, 6 Gold Medals Seem Very Much in Reach

snippet: When Michael Phelps arrived in Rio as a 31-year-old swimmer who retired once and endured plenty of turmoil away from the pool, everyone wondered just how many gold medals was a realistic goal....
